title: My Keybindings Keep Failing
body: Three times now I've loaded into a match to find that my keybindings don't work. I've read that this is caused by data corruption. I repair the game and that fixes it for a while. I'd rather not have to check via bot match that my keybindings work every time I want to play. I need a long term solution.

replies.body:
It's possible that the input settings stored on the servers is corrupt. We can run through a quick reset of it to see if this resolves the issue.

First, **log into League** then jump into **a custom match**. *Alt+Tab* out of the match, then navigate to your installation directory for League, which should be here:

>**C:\Riot Games\League of Legends**

Delete the **CONFIG** folder.

After deleting that folder, *Alt+Tab* back into the custom match and leave it. Hop into another one to confirm the change went through and let me know if this worked.
